topic.title: Podcast For ZeroNet

1573509107_13QAto82vT1NhfaZskZvsopMhp81v.body:
> [caryoscelus](#comment_282_13oRBYqNeUr6Tvgt4KkAT9FT4XRiKFBjnE): What's it about?

A Podcast/Live Audio On ZeroNet, Written In Bash
With One Minute Delay Time

> [caryoscelus](#comment_283_13oRBYqNeUr6Tvgt4KkAT9FT4XRiKFBjnE): So is this just a demo? If it's not, what is (will be) that audio about?

Yes Just A Demo, And Testing For If All Works.

> [clearnet15bad](#comment_28_1PE7nD7YtXWzNdc1EggdBPaqWTYs6jdkK7): Why not gitcenter?http://127.0.0.1:43110/1GitLiXB6t5r8vuU2zC6a8GYj9ME6HMQ4t/

i not use zeronet for a longtime because there too bug and other reasons, but i'm back on zeronet juste for that (or not for that).
new podcast! no merge! please checkout!
